title: Get Started with Enzyme Framework
description: Learn how to build enterprise React applications with Enzyme

steps.title: Verify Your Enzyme Project
steps.description:
The extension automatically detects Enzyme projects. Let's check if this workspace contains an Enzyme project.

[Detect Enzyme Project](command:enzyme.workspace.detect)

steps.title: Initialize Enzyme (New Projects)
steps.description:
Starting a new project? Initialize Enzyme configuration to get started.

[Initialize Enzyme Project](command:enzyme.init)

steps.title: Generate Your First Component
steps.description:
Create React components with TypeScript, proper imports, and optional tests.

[Generate Component](command:enzyme.generate.component)

steps.title: Create a Feature Module
steps.description:
Organize your app with feature-based architecture. Features are self-contained modules with components, routes, state, and API clients.

[Generate Feature](command:enzyme.generate.feature)

steps.title: Explore Project Structure
steps.description: Use the Enzyme Explorer to browse your features, routes, components, stores, and API clients. Click the Enzyme icon in the Activity Bar.

steps.title: Use Code Snippets
steps.description:
Accelerate development with built-in code snippets. Type prefixes like `enzyme-component`, `enzyme-hook`, `enzyme-store` in TypeScript files.

[Show All Snippets](command:enzyme.snippets.show)

steps.title: Validate Configuration
steps.description:
Enzyme validates your configuration and routes in real-time.

[Validate Config](command:enzyme.validate.config)
[Validate Routes](command:enzyme.validate.routes)

steps.title: Monitor Performance
steps.description:
Analyze and optimize your application's performance.

[Analyze Performance](command:enzyme.analyze.performance)
